</div><p>This value set includes codes from the following code systems:</p><ul><li>Include these codes as defined in <a href="CodeSystem-codesystem-payercharacteristics.html"><code>http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-payercharacteristics</code></a><table class="none"><tr><td href="CodeSystem-codesystem-payercharacteristics.html#codesystem-payercharacteristics-procedure">procedure</a></td><td>Procedures</td><td>Measure of service covered by the plan benefit  expressed  in href="CodeSystem-codesystem-payercharacteristics.html#codesystem-payercharacteristics-visithrs">visithrs</a></td><td>Hours per visit</td><td>Measure expresses how many hours per visit are covered by
